title: More chemical attacks will not be tolerated: Pence
text:
More chemical attacks will not be tolerated: Pence 8:50am BST - 01:09 
U.S. Vice President Mike Pence has echoed warnings to Syria on its alleged use of chemical weapons, also saying he thought a re-negotiated NAFTA deal was only weeks away at the end of the Summit of the Americas in Lima, Peru.   
U.S. Vice President Mike Pence has echoed warnings to Syria on its alleged use of chemical weapons, also saying he thought a re-negotiated NAFTA deal was only weeks away at the end of the Summit of the Americas in Lima, Peru.  //reut.rs/2HzxZdY
